name: Us (Sujatro Games)
description:
A very small and simple game of togetherness!

Stuck in a cave, it looks like you will be unable to get out alone. But you have got support.

Solve puzzles using all the characters of the game.

After all, this game is about "me" it is about us".

Controls:

Arrow keys(and AD)- To move around

Spacebar- To jump

C- To change the character

Escape- To pause the game

Submission to the GMTK game jam 2021.
